Name: Moonraker
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A diverse range of flavours come together surprisingly well.
History: Adapted from a recipe in the 1947-72 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide by Victor Bergeron.
Nutrition: One serving of Moonraker contains 223 calories
